name: dotbot-server
description: DotBot Cloud Service - Think in the cloud, act locally

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function cpDir(s,d){fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true});for(const f of fs.readdirSync(s)){const sp=path.join(s,f),dp=path.join(d,f);fs.statSync(sp).isDirectory()?cpDir(sp,dp):f.endsWith('.md')&&fs.copyFileSync(sp,dp)}}cpDir('src/personas','dist/personas');cpDir('src/prompts','dist/prompts')"
